name: Black Friday Blacksmith
description:
It's the beginning of Medieval Black Friday! You are a blacksmith who is trying to complete a sudden influx of orders for weapons. Good thing being a blacksmith is easy because all you have to do is press one button:

THE SPACE BAR

Unfortunately more and more people will start doing their last-minute orders. You can't get them all, so just try to do as many as possible without messing it up

Current bugs: 

  • Upon losing a game, two lives are lost instead of one.
  • The shield hammering game is just rather buggy in general.
  • Sometimes the game will freeze up upon a game over. This occurs when the number of lives is allowed to go below 0.

This is a school project for a WarioWare style blacksmithing game.
